21 template <typename CharT, typename Traits = std::char_traits<CharT>>
22 class BasicStringView
23 {
24 public:
25  using traits_type = Traits;
26  using value_type = CharT;
27  using pointer = CharT*;
28  using const_pointer = const CharT*;
29  using reference = CharT&;
30  using const_reference = const CharT&;
31  using const_iterator = const_pointer;
32  using iterator = const_iterator;
33  using const_reverse_iterator = std::reverse_iterator<const_iterator>;
34  using reverse_iterator = const_reverse_iterator;
35  using size_type = size_t;
36  using difference_type = ptrdiff_t;
37 
41  static constexpr const size_type npos = size_type(-1);
42 
46  constexpr BasicStringView() noexcept {}
47 
53  BasicStringView(const const_pointer str) noexcept :
54  m_data(str), m_size(Traits::length(str))
55  {}
56 
63  constexpr BasicStringView(const const_pointer str, const size_type count) noexcept :
64  m_data(str), m_size(count)
65  {}
66 
72  template<typename ALLOC>
73  constexpr BasicStringView(const std::basic_string<CharT, Traits, ALLOC>& str) noexcept :
74  m_data(str.data()), m_size(str.size())
75  {}
76 
77  BasicStringView(const BasicStringView&) noexcept = default;
78  BasicStringView& operator=(const BasicStringView&) noexcept = default;
79 
85  constexpr const_iterator begin() const noexcept
86  {
87  return m_data;
88  }
89 
95  constexpr const_iterator cbegin() const noexcept
96  {
97  return begin();
98  }
99 
105  constexpr const_iterator end() const noexcept
106  {
107  return m_data + m_size;
108  }
109 
115  constexpr const_iterator cend() const noexcept
116  {
117  return end();
118  }
119 
125  constexpr const_reverse_iterator rbegin() const noexcept
126  {
127  return const_reverse_iterator(end());
128  }
129 
135  constexpr const_reverse_iterator crbegin() const noexcept
136  {
137  return rbegin();
138  }
139 
145  constexpr const_reverse_iterator rend() const noexcept
146  {
147  return const_reverse_iterator(begin());
148  }
149 
155  constexpr const_reverse_iterator crend() const noexcept
156  {
157  return rend();
158  }
159 
166  constexpr const_reference operator[](const size_type pos) const noexcept
167  {
168  return m_data[pos];
169  }
170 
179  const_reference at(const size_type pos) const
180  {
181  if (pos >= m_size)
182  throw std::out_of_range("String view position out of range.");
183  return m_data[pos];
184  }
185 
191  constexpr const_reference front() const noexcept
192  {
193  return m_data[0];
194  }
195 
201  constexpr const_reference back() const noexcept
202  {
203  return m_data[m_size - 1];
204  }
205 
211  constexpr const_pointer data() const noexcept
212  {
213  return m_data;
214  }
215 
221  constexpr size_type size() const noexcept
222  {
223  return m_size;
224  }
225 
231  constexpr size_type length() const noexcept
232  {
233  return size();
234  }
235 
241  constexpr size_type max_size() const noexcept
242  {
243  return std::numeric_limits<size_type>::max();
244  }
245 
251  constexpr bool empty() const noexcept
252  {
253  return size() == 0;
254  }
255 
261  void remove_prefix(size_type n)
262  {
263  m_data += n;
264  m_size -= n;
265  }
266 
272  void remove_suffix(size_type n)
273  {
274  m_size -= n;
275  }
276 
282  void swap(BasicStringView& other) noexcept
283  {
284  std::swap(m_data, other.m_data);
285  std::swap(m_size, other.m_size);
286  }
287 
296  size_type copy(CharT* dest, size_type count, size_type pos = 0) const
297  {
298  if (pos > size())
299  throw std::out_of_range("String view position out of range.");
300  const size_t rcount = std::min(count, size() - pos);
301  Traits::copy(dest, data() + pos, rcount);
302  return rcount;
303  }
304 
312  BasicStringView substr(size_type pos = 0, size_type count = npos) const
313  {
314  if (pos > size())
315  throw std::out_of_range("String view position out of range.");
316  const size_t rcount = std::min(count, size() - pos);
317  return BasicStringView(m_data + pos, rcount);
318  }
319 
327  int compare(BasicStringView other) const noexcept
328  {
329  const size_type rlen = std::min(size(), other.size());
330  const int cmp = Traits::compare(data(), other.data(), rlen);
331 
332  if (cmp != 0)
333  return cmp;
334 
335  if (size() < other.size())
336  return -1;
337  else if (size() > other.size())
338  return 1;
339  else
340  return 0;
341  }
342 
352  int compare(size_type pos1, size_type count1, BasicStringView other) const
353  {
354  return substr(pos1, count1).compare(other);
355  }
356 
368  int compare(size_type pos1, size_type count1, BasicStringView other, size_type pos2, size_type count2) const
369  {
370  return substr(pos1, count1).compare(other.substr(pos2, count2));
371  }
372 
380  int compare(const CharT* str) const
381  {
382  return compare(BasicStringView(str));
383  }
384 
394  int compare(size_type pos1, size_type count1, const CharT* str) const
395  {
396  return substr(pos1, count1).compare(BasicStringView(str));
397  }
398 
409  int compare(size_type pos1, size_type count1, const CharT* str, size_type count2) const
410  {
411  return substr(pos1, count1).compare(BasicStringView(str, count2));
412  }
413 
421  size_type find(BasicStringView str, size_type pos = 0) const noexcept
422  {
423  if (pos >= size() || str.size() > size() - pos)
424  return npos; // the string cannot be there
425 
426  if (str.size() == 0)
427  return pos; // zero-sized search, this defaults to the match at the beginning
428 
429  const const_pointer startPtr = data() + pos; // where the searching will start
430  const const_pointer endPtr = data() + (size() - str.size()) + 1; // where the searching will end
431 
432  // initial position
433  const_pointer ptr = Traits::find(startPtr, static_cast<size_t>(endPtr - startPtr), str[0]);
434  while (ptr)
435  {
436  // check if the searched string is present
437  if (Traits::compare(ptr, str.data(), str.size()) == 0)
438  {
439  return static_cast<size_t>(ptr - data());
440  }
441 
442  // go to next position
443  ptr = Traits::find(ptr + 1, static_cast<size_t>(endPtr - ptr - 1), str[0]);
444  }
445 
446  return npos;
447  }
448 
456  size_type find(CharT ch, size_type pos = 0) const noexcept
457  {
458  return find(BasicStringView(std::addressof(ch), 1), pos);
459  }
460 
469  size_type find(const CharT* str, size_type pos, size_type count) const
470  {
471  return find(BasicStringView(str, count), pos);
472  }
473 
481  size_type find(const CharT* str, size_type pos = 0) const
482  {
483  return find(BasicStringView(str), pos);
484  }
485 
493  size_type rfind(BasicStringView str, size_type pos = npos) const noexcept
494  {
495  if (str.size() > size())
496  return npos;
497 
498  for (size_t p = std::min(size_type(size() - str.size()), pos) + 1; p > 0; --p)
499  {
500  if (Traits::compare(data() + p - 1, str.data(), str.size()) == 0)
501  return p - 1;
502  }
503 
504  return npos;
505  }
506 
514  size_type rfind(CharT ch, size_type pos = npos) const noexcept
515  {
516  return rfind(BasicStringView(std::addressof(ch), 1), pos);
517  }
518 
526  size_type rfind(const CharT* str, size_type pos, size_type count) const
527  {
528  return rfind(BasicStringView(str, count), pos);
529  }
530 
538  size_type rfind(const CharT* str, size_type pos = npos) const
539  {
540  return rfind(BasicStringView(str), pos);
541  }
542 
550  size_type find_first_of(BasicStringView str, size_type pos = 0) const noexcept
551  {
552  if (str.size() == 0 || pos >= size())
553  return npos;
554 
555  for (size_type idx = pos; idx < size(); ++idx)
556  {
557  if (Traits::find(str.data(), str.size(), data()[idx]) != nullptr)
558  return idx;
559  }
560 
561  return npos;
562  }
563 
571  size_type find_first_of(CharT ch, size_type pos = 0) const noexcept
572  {
573  return find_first_of(BasicStringView(std::addressof(ch), 1), pos);
574  }
575 
584  size_type find_first_of(const CharT* str, size_type pos, size_type count) const
585  {
586  return find_first_of(BasicStringView(str, count), pos);
587  }
588 
596  size_type find_first_of(const CharT* str, size_type pos = 0) const
597  {
598  return find_first_of(BasicStringView(str), pos);
599  }
600 
608  size_type find_last_of(BasicStringView str, size_type pos = npos) const noexcept
609  {
610  if (str.empty() || empty())
611  return npos;
612 
613  for (size_type idx = std::min(pos + 1, size()); idx > 0; --idx)
614  {
615  if (Traits::find(str.data(), str.size(), data()[idx - 1]) != nullptr)
616  return idx - 1;
617  }
618 
619  return npos;
620  }
621 
629  size_type find_last_of(CharT ch, size_type pos = npos) const noexcept
630  {
631  return find_last_of(BasicStringView(std::addressof(ch), 1), pos);
632  }
633 
642  size_type find_last_of(const CharT* str, size_type pos, size_type count) const
643  {
644  return find_last_of(BasicStringView(str, count), pos);
645  }
646 
654  size_type find_last_of(const CharT* str, size_type pos = npos) const
655  {
656  return find_last_of(BasicStringView(str), pos);
657  }
658 
666  size_type find_first_not_of(BasicStringView str, size_type pos = 0) const noexcept
667  {
668  if (str.size() == 0 || pos >= size())
669  return npos;
670 
671  for (size_type idx = pos; idx < size(); ++idx)
672  {
673  if (Traits::find(str.data(), str.size(), data()[idx]) == nullptr)
674  return idx;
675  }
676 
677  return npos;
678  }
679 
687  size_type find_first_not_of(CharT ch, size_type pos = 0) const noexcept
688  {
689  return find_first_not_of(BasicStringView(std::addressof(ch), 1), pos);
690  }
691 
700  size_type find_first_not_of(const CharT* str, size_type pos, size_type count) const
701  {
702  return find_first_not_of(BasicStringView(str, count), pos);
703  }
704 
712  size_type find_first_not_of(const CharT* str, size_type pos = 0) const
713  {
714  return find_first_not_of(BasicStringView(str), pos);
715  }
716 
724  size_type find_last_not_of(BasicStringView str, size_type pos = npos) const noexcept
725  {
726  if (str.empty() || empty())
727  return npos;
728 
729  for (size_type idx = std::min(pos + 1, size()); idx > 0; --idx)
730  {
731  if (Traits::find(str.data(), str.size(), data()[idx - 1]) == nullptr)
732  return idx - 1;
733  }
734 
735  return npos;
736  }
737 
745  size_type find_last_not_of(CharT ch, size_type pos = npos) const noexcept
746  {
747  return find_last_not_of(BasicStringView(std::addressof(ch), 1), pos);
748  }
749 
758  size_type find_last_not_of(const CharT* str, size_type pos, size_type count) const
759  {
760  return find_last_not_of(BasicStringView(str, count), pos);
761  }
762 
770  size_type find_last_not_of(const CharT* str, size_type pos = npos) const
771  {
772  return find_last_not_of(BasicStringView(str), pos);
773  }
774 
775 private:
776  const_pointer m_data = nullptr;
777  size_type m_size = 0;
778 };

790 template<typename CharT, class Traits>
791 constexpr bool operator==(BasicStringView<CharT, Traits> lhs, BasicStringView<CharT, Traits> rhs) noexcept
792 {
793  return lhs.compare(rhs) == 0;
794 }
795 
803 template<typename CharT, class Traits>
804 constexpr bool operator!=(BasicStringView<CharT, Traits> lhs, BasicStringView<CharT, Traits> rhs) noexcept
805 {
806  return lhs.compare(rhs) != 0;
807 }
808 
816 template<typename CharT, class Traits>
817 constexpr bool operator<(BasicStringView<CharT, Traits> lhs, BasicStringView<CharT, Traits> rhs) noexcept
818 {
819  return lhs.compare(rhs) < 0;
820 }
821 
829 template<typename CharT, class Traits>
830 constexpr bool operator<=(BasicStringView<CharT, Traits> lhs, BasicStringView<CharT, Traits> rhs) noexcept
831 {
832  return lhs.compare(rhs) <= 0;
833 }
834 
842 template<typename CharT, class Traits>
843 constexpr bool operator>(BasicStringView<CharT, Traits> lhs, BasicStringView<CharT, Traits> rhs) noexcept
844 {
845  return lhs.compare(rhs) > 0;
846 }
847 
855 template<typename CharT, class Traits>
856 constexpr bool operator>=(BasicStringView<CharT, Traits> lhs, BasicStringView<CharT, Traits> rhs) noexcept
857 {
858  return lhs.compare(rhs) >= 0;
859 }
860 
867 template<typename CharT, size_t N>
868 constexpr BasicStringView<CharT> makeStringView(const CharT(&str)[N])
869 {
870  // Note: strip the very last null terminator, if it is there
871  return BasicStringView<CharT>(str, (N > 0 && str[N - 1] == CharT()) ? (N - 1) : N);
872 }
873 
882 template<typename CharT, typename Traits, typename ALLOC = std::allocator<char>>
883 std::basic_string<CharT, Traits, RebindAlloc<ALLOC, CharT>> stringViewToString(
884  BasicStringView<CharT, Traits> stringView, const ALLOC& allocator = ALLOC())
885 {
886  return std::basic_string<CharT, Traits, RebindAlloc<ALLOC, CharT>>(stringView.data(), stringView.size(),
887  allocator);
888 }
889 
897 template<typename CharT, typename Traits, typename ALLOC = std::allocator<char>>
898 std::basic_string<CharT, Traits, ALLOC>& operator+=(
899  std::basic_string<CharT, Traits, ALLOC>& first, BasicStringView<CharT, Traits> second)
900 {
901  return first.append(second.data(), second.size());
902 }
